hiphop.name: De Kweker
hiphop.bio: Raw and local. Story-driven hip hop rooted in West Flanders.

hiphop.name: Duvve
hiphop.bio: West-Flemish rapper known for high-energy shows — often backed by his own live band.

hiphop.name: MC Tubbie
hiphop.bio: Known in the West-Flemish scene for weekly freestyles and collaborations (incl. Samoerai).

hiphop.name: ThePANDA
hiphop.bio: English-spitting voice of the crew — representing Kwartier West in Brussels (BXL).

hiphop.name: bruce
hiphop.bio: Producer with a clean ear for drums and mood — focused on underground energy.

hiphop.name: creamz
hiphop.bio: Beatmaker and sound architect — from sketch to finished record.

tekno.name: Example Tekno
tekno.bio: Placeholder entry so events can reference a tekno lineup without warnings.
